message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $1000000 for the item. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $1150000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $1100000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $1080000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
